item.title: Report X-2024010623
item.description:
Report X-2024010623

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T15:12:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-27
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER UNLOADING VAN LINE NOTIFIED HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN OF DAMAGED HAZMAT INSIDE VAN. DescribePack: SIDE OF BOX BUSTED OPEN. DENT IN BOTTLE CAUSED CONTENTS TO SPILL FROM UNDER CAP. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN USING PROPER PPE PLACED THE PACKAGE INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.
